CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In the out - of - plane of PQCDTB , as shown Figure 1a , a sharp diffraction peak was observed at 4.0 , 8.1 , 12.2 ° , which indicates the formation of ordered lamellar structure as an out - of - plane peak ( h00 ) by the alkyl side chain of quinacridone and conventional edge-on πstacking.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| quinacridone |
| alkyl side chain of quinacridone |

The paragraph mentions "quinacridone" and "alkyl side chain of quinacridone" as the material names.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| quinacridone |
| alkyl side chain of quinacridone |

The paragraph mentions "quinacridone" and "alkyl side chain of quinacridone" as the material names. Other entities such as "PQCDTB", "Figure 1a", "h00", and "degrees" do not clearly refer to materials.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In the out - of - plane of PQCDTB , as shown Figure 1a , a sharp diffraction peak was observed at 4.0 , 8.1 , 12.2 ° , which indicates the formation of ordered lamellar structure as an out - of - plane peak ( h00 ) by the alkyl side chain of quinacridone and conventional edge-on πstacking.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| out-of-plane of PQCDTB |
| 4.0 ° |
| 8.1 ° |
| 12.2 ° |
| ordered lamellar structure |
| h00 |
| alkyl side chain of quinacridone |
| conventional edge-on πstacking |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| ordered lamellar structure (as an out-of-plane peak) |
| h00 |
| alkyl side chain of quinacridone |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties. "Out-of-plane of PQCDTB" is a spatial description, "sharp diffraction peak" is a measurement result, "indicates the formation of" is an explanatory statement, "as an out-of-plane peak" is a descriptive phrase, "h00" is a specific diffraction condition, and "conventional edge-on πstacking" is a structural property of the material but it is already included in "alkyl side chain of quinacridone".
